title: JavaScript for Beginners
description: Learn the basics of JavaScript, the most popular programming language for web development.

instructor.name: John Doe
instructor.bio: John has been a software engineer for 10+ years, teaching JavaScript to thousands of students worldwide.

curriculum.title: Introduction to JavaScript
curriculum.content: Learn about variables, functions, and loops in this introductory module.

curriculum.title: Working with DOM
curriculum.content: Learn how to manipulate the Document Object Model using JavaScript.

title: CSS Mastery
description: Take your CSS skills to the next level and learn modern layout techniques like Flexbox and Grid.

instructor.name: Jane Smith
instructor.bio: Jane is a web designer and developer with over 8 years of experience in creating beautiful, responsive websites.

curriculum.title: CSS Fundamentals
curriculum.content: Review the basics of CSS, selectors, and properties.

curriculum.title: Advanced Layouts
curriculum.content: Dive into advanced layout techniques using Flexbox and CSS Grid.

reviews.text: Learned a lot of new techniques.
